channel.title: Null’s Kits - Volume One
channel.description:
Hey everyone! I’d like to introduce a new project of mine that I’ll be releasing monthly, titled Null’s Kits.
Each ‘pack’ is going to contain four drum kits created and tuned for a specific genre, and I would love to get some input on what you peeps want to see next.
I’m still unsure about including any of my kits that use samples, but if downloading a folder from a separate link isn’t too much of a hassle for you guys, I’ll be sure to put one or two in the next pack.
Make sure you read the labels on the instruments in the project, they’ve got some info as well.
Thanks for checking it out, hopefully this helps anyone who’s stuck :slight_smile:
—Link to project—
https://app.auxy.co/projects/SK2benKTY0WazcVYPGnZLg==
—Link to project—

item.title: Null’s Kits - Volume One

item.description:
Hey everyone! I’d like to introduce a new project of mine that I’ll be releasing monthly, titled Null’s Kits.

Each ‘pack’ is going to contain four drum kits created and tuned for a specific genre, and I would love to get some input on what you peeps want to see next.

I’m still unsure about including any of my kits that use samples, but if downloading a folder from a separate link isn’t too much of a hassle for you guys, I’ll be sure to put one or two in the next pack.

Make sure you read the labels on the instruments in the project, they’ve got some info as well.

Thanks for checking it out, hopefully this helps anyone who’s stuck
